The KSG-23 is a pump-action shotgun that holds 13 rounds of 23x75 ammunition. It is lightweight and very useful in close-range combat.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All Red Dot scopes for picatinny/weaver. 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: Swine-23

Larger variant of KSG-12 called KSG-25 is a pump-action shotgun that holds 24 rounds of 12 gauge ammunition . It is lightweight and very useful in close-range combat.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All Red Dot scopes for picatinny/weaver. 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: SilencerCo Salvo® 12
